dict.string: Consent to proceed with Kidney Care.
Now you will create a passcode to identify yourself to the app and protect access to information you've entered.
This step concludes the onboarding and consent process of the CardinalKit framework. Next up, you will see main app functionality.
Please try again in five minutes.

Use this text to provide an explanation to your app participants about what activity data you intend to read from the Health app and why. This sample will read step count, distance, heart rate, and flights climbed data.
Enabling notifications will allow us to send you reminders about when to take your meds and complete your tasks!

Use this text to provide an explanation to your app participants about what electronic health records (EHR) you intend to collect from the Health app and why. This sample will read all available records (for which permission is granted).
Sign in using your Apple ID is fast and easy, and Apple will not track any of your activities.
We need to confirm your email address and send you a copy of the consent you just signed.
Are you sure you want to withdraw?
Withdrawing from the study will reset the app to the state it was in prior to you originally joining the study.
Thank you for your contribution to this study. We are sorry that you could not continue. The app will now close.
Kidney Care is an application focused on assisting doctors with the post-transplant operation care process.
Kidney Care is an application focused on assisting doctors with the post-transplant operation care process.

Within the application, we will be collecting a variety of data to best assist you in the recovery process. We will start by collecting patient information, including age, gender, and ethnicity. Then we will ask for details regarding your operation, such as date of surgery, comorbidities, and the cause of kidney disease. All of this information will only be collected once, and then beyond that the app will consist of tasks and surveys that will better help them track your condition and progress during recovery.

Within the application, we will be collecting a variety of data to best assist you in the recovery process. We will start by collecting patient information, including age, gender, and ethnicity. Then we will ask for details regarding your operation, such as date of surgery, comorbidities, and the cause of kidney disease. All of this information will only be collected once, and then beyond that the app will consist of tasks and surveys that will better help them track your condition and progress during recovery.

Data protection and privacy is of utmost importance to the Kidney Care team. The only people that will have access to your data is yourself and the doctors you choose to grant access to your medical information.

Data protection and privacy is of utmost importance to the Kidney Care team. The only people that will have access to your data is yourself and the doctors you choose to grant access to your medical information.

Your data will be used to track progress during the road to recovery post transplant surgery. Information will be sent to your doctor for patient management and ensuring you are recieving the care you need.

Your data will be used to track progress during the road to recovery post transplant surgery. Information will be sent to your doctor for patient management and ensuring you are recieving the care you need.
The account creation and onboarding process should take less than 5 minutes of your time! Beyond that, your engagement with the app relies on the outpatient care plan of you and your doctor.
The account creation and onboarding process should take less than 5 minutes of your time! Beyond that, your engagement with the app relies on the outpatient care plan of you and your doctor.
Beyond onboarding information, surveys include the SF-12 Health Survey and a daily 1-2 minute check-in regarding your condition that day.
Beyond onboarding information, surveys include the SF-12 Health Survey and a daily 1-2 minute check-in regarding your condition that day.
Certain active tasks may involve gait and balance tests, walking tests, tremor tests, and cognition tests.
Certain active tasks may involve gait and balance tests, walking tests, tremor tests, and cognition tests.
We hope this app will help you live a healthy life post-kidney transplant.
You can manage all of your medications and set personalized alarms as reminders within the app.
You can store medical data within the app to share with your doctors.
